input_email_body:
Subject: Support for Data Breach in Medical Records System

A data breach has been detected in the medical records system, which could potentially compromise patient information You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. The incident may have occurred due to outdated security protocols or a phishing attack My name is Sophia Rossi.. We have initiated a security audit and reset access credentials for affected accounts.
